author: quinlan
msg: change test types to constants (odd-numbered ones are now evals too)
change some '-' characters in option names to '_' characters to be
parse eval options at parse time instead of run-time (5.5% speed-up)
reorder if/elsif during finish_parsing a bit for somewhat better speed
(order by frequency of test, probably not a noticeable difference)
use tr// in two places instead of s//

author: quinlan
msg: change some '-' characters to be '_' for better consistency (the majority
of usage and examples use _ instead of - for the option word separator)

author: felicity
msg: Found more "close STDIN" statements with the next call too -- replaced as per last commit.

author: felicity
msg: Fix for bug 1325, we don't need to close STDIN so don't. ;)
Also, there's a next call where there's no context for a next, so perl
(5.8.0 at least) treats it as a return, so just call return.
